set.name: Badge of Justice, Class Starter Decks

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may pay. If you do, draw a card. Otherwise, destroy this item.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your hero deals combat damage, put that many Fanatic ally tokens into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / health.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an ally in your party is destroyed, you may remove it from the game. If you do, Essence of the Martyr becomes a copy of that ally with this power, and you remove all damage from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, put a Blocker ally token into play with 0 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and protector.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a non-token ally in your party would be destroyed, attach it to a hero instead. That ally loses all powers and becomes an ability with "At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached hero."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may destroy this item. If you do, each player puts all allies from his graveyard into play.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight, Hunter, Paladin, Rogue, Shaman, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Flip --> Target ally has Invincible this turn. (It can't leave play, be targeted or be dealt damage).

property.name: Rules
property.value: Heroes and allies you control have Protector. Each opposing hero and ally has -2 ATK on controller's turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you draw a card, add a verse counter. [Activate], remove three verse counters --> Target weapon has Assault 3 this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Discard an equipment --> Add a murder counter. Your hero has Assault 1 for each murder counter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this armor enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon. Opposing weapons have -1 ATK. Opposing armor have -1 DEF

property.name: Rules
property.value: Opposing cards lose and can't have Untargetable. Damage your hero deals with abilities is Unpreventable. When your hero would deal damage with a weapon, it deals that much +1 instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Opposing heroes and allies enter play exhausted. At the end of each opponent's turn, exhaust all heroes and allies he controls

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, look at the top card of your deck and remove it from the game face down. 2, Discard your hand, destroy this armor. --> Put each card you removed this way into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn: 3, [Flip] --> Remove target opposing ability, ally, or equipment from the game. Its owner puts it into play at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each opponent's turn, if a card didn't enter his graveyard this turn, he discards a card. (DEFENSE 1)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed abilities and equipment into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 5 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card for each different [Horde] race among heroes and allies you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protector When this ally is dealt combat damage by an attacking ally, you may put an [Alliance] ally with cost less than or equal to that attacking ally's cost from your hand into play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust your hero and pay 2 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 5 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card for each different [Alliance] race among heroes and allies you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you control more allies than an opponent: Pay 1 to complete this quest.Reward: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this ally.)When this ally deals fatal damage to a defending ally, you may put target [Horde] ally with cost less than or equal to that defending ally's cost from your graveyard into play.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 3 to complete this quest.Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed allies into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
